description: This PHP source file implements a web page for configuring VoIP hidden settings, specifically the 'Sky Disconnect Line Current Until Registered' feature. It includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP code to display the interface and handle user interactions, as well as fetching and submitting configuration data.

methods.name: Dm_data_get
methods.description: A PHP function that retrieves the current value of the VoIP line registration disable setting.
